description: LangChain integration for the Brainiall LLM Gateway providing ChatBrainiall and BrainiallEmbeddings classes with access to 113+ AI models from 17 providers through a single OpenAI-compatible API
rules: Use ChatBrainiall as a drop-in replacement for ChatOpenAI
Use BrainiallEmbeddings as a drop-in replacement for OpenAIEmbeddings
Set BRAINIALL_API_KEY environment variable for authentication
Use nova-micro for cheap tasks and claude-opus-4-6 for complex tasks
All ChatOpenAI features work: streaming, tool calling, structured output, async, batching
